file_content.text: This is Naval Command to ground. The Empire has control of this coastline. We need to establish a beachhead to land our transports.
Situation alert zero: The Republic has landed forces and is attempting to establish a beachhead on Denova.
You'll need at least two emplacements to penetrate the bunker's shields. After that, we've got a hope of winning this planet.
Your shuttle has dropped you near an enemy bunker. Use the coastline's artillery emplacements to turn that bunker to dust.
This bunker and the coastline's artillery emplacements must be protected and the enemy position annihilated.
Use the artillery to target the Republic's captured base. The base is shielded, but two emplacements should provide sufficient firepower.
Combat data transmitting. Your shuttle has delivered you into Republic territory; objective is to establish a beachhead for our naval forces.
Primary target: Republic defense bunker. Primary weapon: coastline artillery emplacements.
Capture a minimum of two emplacements to penetrate the enemy bunker's shields. Upon the bunker's destruction, our vehicles will secure the coast.
Red alert! The coastline's under attack--the Empire is trying to establish a beachhead.
All forces to the artillery emplacements. We'll need at least two to penetrate the enemy's shields--they've captured a bunker of their own.
Lose this battle and we could lose Denova. May the Force be with us.
Warning: This is a Republic training simulation using real firepower. Unauthorized personnel must leave immediately.
The attacking team is attempting to establish a beachhead on a protected coastline. The attackers have landed at a captured bunker; the defending team is entrenched in its own bunker.
Each side must attempt to secure at least two artillery emplacements to penetrate the opposing bunker's shields.
Whichever team destroys the opposing bunker wins the exercise. Good luck.
This is wargame simulation seven-three alpha. Warning: lethal firepower has been authorized.
This scenario depicts the invasion of a protected coastline. Both attacking team and defending team possess shielded bunkers.
Each team must attempt to seize artillery emplacements to destroy the enemy bunker. Two are required to penetrate a bunker's shields.
The team with the surviving bunker will be declared victorious and shall be rewarded. Failure is its own price.
Republic forces incoming. Protect the artillery emplacements!
Head for the artillery emplacements! For the Republic!
Imperial troops are on the way. Get to the artillery emplacements!
Assault begins now. Seize the artillery emplacements for Imperial glory!
Attacking team: begin your assault on the artillery emplacements now.
Defending team: secure the artillery emplacements now.
Assault begins now. Attacking team, proceed to the artillery emplacements.
Assault begins now. Defending team, proceed to the artillery emplacements.
Objective achieved. Southern artillery emplacement secure.
Objective lost. Southern artillery emplacement captured.
We've got the southern emplacement. Firing now.
Southern emplacement lost. We're taking fire.
Southern artillery emplacement secure.
Warning: southern emplacement lost.
We just lost the southern emplacement. Taking fire.
Southern artillery emplacement acquired. Targeting.
Taking control of southern emplacement.
Warning: Southern emplacement is at risk.
Stay on the southern emplacement--it's almost ours.
The Republic is after the southern emplacement. Respond.
Beginning capture of southern emplacement.
Imps are after the southern emplacement!
Attempting to capture southern emplacement.
The enemy is attacking the southern emplacement.
Objective achieved. Western emplacement secure.
Objective lost. Western emplacement captured.
The western emplacement is ours.
The Republic has taken the western emplacement.
Western emplacement now under Imperial control.
The Empire just got the western emplacement!
Western artillery emplacement secure.
Enemy has captured the western emplacement.
Now capturing western emplacement.
Enemy attempting to capture western emplacement.
Keep securing that western emplacement!
Enemy attempting to capture western emplacement.
Attempting to secure western emplacement.
Western emplacement is under attack!
Western emplacement targeted for capture.
Enemy forces at western emplacement.
Objective achieved. Eastern artillery emplacement secure.
Objective lost. Eastern artillery emplacement captured.
Eastern emplacement is armed and ready.
We've lost the eastern emplacement.
The eastern emplacement belongs to us.
Eastern emplacement's now with the enemy.
Eastern artillery emplacement secure.
Your opponents have secured the eastern emplacement.
Targeting eastern emplacement now.
Enemy force at eastern emplacement.
We've almost got the eastern emplacement!
The eastern emplacement is under attack.
Attempting to capture eastern emplacement.
They're after the eastern emplacement!
You are targeting the eastern emplacement.
The enemy is striking the eastern emplacement.
Artillery is breaking through the enemy shield. Maintain firepower.
Enemy firepower has increased. Your bunker is taking damage.
Breaking through the Imperial shield! Keep up the pressure.
The Republic is penetrating our shields. Retake the emplacements immediately.
Your artillery is now damaging the enemy bunker. Well done.
Shields are down. The enemy is damaging your bunker.
We are penetrating the Republic shield. Continue firing.
Our bunker is taking damage! We need that artillery!
Attacking team suffering damage to base. Recommend tactical adjustment.
Your team has dealt significant damage to the enemy bunker. Continue repelling the attack.
They're hitting our bunker hard. We need to keep pushing!
The Republic attackers are taking damage. Continue firing upon their bunker.
Warning: Your bunker has suffered severe damage.
The attacking team's bunker is nearly destroyed. Maintain position.
Our bunker's almost in pieces! Take that artillery or this whole assault fails!
The enemy bunker is nearly destroyed. The Republic attack will soon be repelled.
Your offensive bunker has been destroyed. Calculating scenario outcome.
You have successfully destroyed the attackers' bunker. Calculating scenario outcome.
They've taken out the bunker! All forces, retreat!
The Republic bunker has been destroyed. The coastline is now secure.
Your team has greatly damaged the defenders' bunker. Continue pressing the attack.
Defending team suffering damage to base. Recommend tactical adjustment.
They're tearing our bunker apart. Hold the line!
The Republic bunker is severely damaged. Redouble the assault.
Defending team's bunker is nearly destroyed. Your victory is imminent.
Warning: Your bunker is in critical condition. Mission failure is imminent.
The Republic bunker is in critical condition. Destroy it and the coast is ours.
You have to repel the Imps! The bunker's about to collapse!
You have annihilated the defending team's bunker. Calculating scenario outcome.
Your defensive bunker has been destroyed. Calculating scenario outcome.
The Republic bunker has been destroyed. Victory goes to the Empire.
Our bunker has been destroyed! The coast is lost--all forces, retreat!
The Republic has damaged our bunker. Reconfigure tactics before the assault fails.
We've hit the Imperials hard--their forward bunker is badly damaged!
Your bunker has taken damage. You must increase firepower for your assault to succeed.
The attacking team's bunker has been damaged. Your defensive tactics are admirable.
Registering severe damage. Increase firepower now!
That Imperial bunker is ready to fall. Their attack stops here!
Your bunker is nearing collapse. Odds of survival decreasing.
Opposing bunker is nearing collapse. Recommend a final counterattack.
Our bunker has been destroyed. Retreat or die fighting.
We took out the bunker! The Imperials are turning back!
Your bunker has been destroyed. Analyzing final outcome.
You have destroyed the attacking team's bunker. Analyzing final outcome.
Their bunker is in bad shape. Keep pushing forward!
Orange alert: our bunker is severely damaged. Reclaim the artillery immediately.
Your assault proceeds well. Severe damage to enemy bunker.
Your bunker is suffering damage. You must repel the attacking team.
Enemy is severely damaged! Keep them on the ropes!
Red alert: our bunker is in critical condition. Push the Republic back!
Your team has critically damaged the enemy bunker. Maintain superior position.
Your defense of the bunker is failing. Respond immediately.
The Imps are retreating--the coastline is ours!
We have failed to repel the invasion. Retreat, or die with honor.
You have destroyed the defending team's bunker. Analyzing final outcome.
Your bunker has been destroyed. Enemies have overtaken the coast. Analyzing final outcome.
The attacking team has secured a beachhead for invasion. Simulation complete.
The defending team cannot secure the coastline. The attackers win; simulation complete.
Calling all vehicles in to land. Catch your breath--that was fine work.
The Republic has taken the coast. We'll have revenge another day.
The defending team has repelled your invasion and securing a beachhead is impossible. Simulation complete.
You have repelled your opponents' attack and secured the coast. Simulation complete.
The Republic invasion force is landing. We've lost the coast.
The Imperial assault has been defeated. The coastline is secure.
Attackers succeed in overtaking the coastline. Your victory will be recognized; wargame complete.
The invasion force has triumphed. Your defeat has been recorded; wargame complete.
Our ships are landing now. The coastline is secure.
They're landing an invasion force. The coast belongs to the Empire.
The Republic will not set foot here again. Victory for the Emperor.
We can't even get close. We'll win the beachhead another day.
Your attack has been repelled and your defeat has been recorded; wargame complete.
The invasion force has been repelled. Your victory will be recognized; wargame complete.
An ally is Unbeatable!
An ally is Invincible!
An ally is Immortal!
An enemy is Unbeatable!
An enemy is Invincible!
An enemy is Immortal!
You are Unbeatable!
You are Invincible!
You are Immortal!
An ally is Unbeatable!
An ally is Invincible!
An ally is Immortal!
An enemy is Unbeatable!
An enemy is Invincible!
An enemy is Immortal!
You are Unbeatable!
You are Invincible!
You are Immortal!
An ally is Unbeatable!
An ally is Invincible!
An ally is Immortal!
An enemy is Unbeatable!
An enemy is Invincible!
An enemy is Immortal!
You are Unbeatable!
You are Invincible!
You are Immortal!
An ally is Unbeatable!
An ally is Invincible!
An ally is Immortal!
An enemy is Unbeatable!
An enemy is Invincible!
An enemy is Immortal!
You are Unbeatable!
You are Invincible!
You are Immortal!
